content.question: Outsourced industrial production in less-developed countries often relies on female labor because

choices.label: men are engaged mainly in agriculture
wage rates for women are much lower than for men
women are more skilled at operating machinery than men are
social taboos prevent women from working in the service sector
women are not protected by international labor laws

content.answer: wage rates for women are much lower than for men

unit.text: 7: Industrial and Economic Development Patterns and Processes

skill.text: Skill 2.B: Explain spatial relationships in a specified context or region of the world, using geographic concepts, processes, models, or theories.
